channel.title: hl2.exe crash - office complex
channel.description:
Hello Community,
the game constantly crashes at that point (see pic) in the office complex. It's where you climb up the elevator shaft and that one scientist is hanging at the end of the ladder and eventually falls (poor bugger). You walk up the stairs and the elevator is descending and stops. I then enter the elevator through the manhole. After a second in the elevator the game is loading (excitement!) and that's it... hl2.exe crashes... always!
attempts: - lowering video settings (all settings) - no flashlight - jumping around and shooting (that was, when I was frustrated) - started playing the whole office complex again
nothing worked so far. Can you please help Freeman? He's a bit upset. ![BM-OC.jpg|690x500](upload://v4NFAy3icidRh13V2pVjE9zIUVU.jpeg)

item.title: hl2.exe crash - office complex
item.dc:creator: mBollong
item.description:
Restarted the computer. Fixed it.
Thread can be deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: hl2.exe crash - office complex
item.dc:creator: mBollong
item.description:
Hello Community,

the game constantly crashes at that point (see pic) in the office complex.
It’s where you climb up the elevator shaft and that one scientist is hanging at the end of the ladder and eventually falls (poor bugger). You walk up the stairs and the elevator is descending and stops. I then enter the elevator through the manhole. After a second in the elevator the game is loading (excitement!) and that’s it… hl2.exe crashes… always!

attempts:

  • lowering video settings (all settings)
  • no flashlight
  • jumping around and shooting (that was, when I was frustrated)
  • started playing the whole office complex again

nothing worked so far. Can you please help Freeman? He’s a bit upset.

BM-OC.jpg1279×959 44.5 KB
